General.Name: Dinhvu Port Investment Development JSC
General.Description: Dinh Vu Port Development and Investment Joint Stock Company operates Dinh Vu Port in Vietnam. Its port services include loading and unloading services, storage and preservation of goods, warehousing, transport agency, import and export, transportation of multimodal goods, maritime, towage, and ship support services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hai Phong, Vietnam.
